archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Application Architecture
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
Application Architecture (Application Layer)
Components:
• Application (Application Component) • Interface (Application Interface) • Use Case (Application Service) • Application Behavior (Application Function)
Examples:
• Application: EHR System (e.g., Epic) • Interface: FHIR-based API • Use Case: Retrieve Lab Test Results • Application Behavior: Patient Lookup Functionality
